subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joe Thornton scored his first goal of the playoffs with 7:23 left, and the Sharks beat the Red Wings, 4-3, to take a 2-0 lead in their Western Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Joe Thornton scored his first goal of the playoffs with 7:23 left, and the Sharks beat the Red Wings, 4-3, to take a 2-0 lead in their Western Conference semifinal series.
